  • Constructor Details

    • Smugglers

      public Smugglers()
      Constructs a new instance of the Smugglers card. This constructor sets the card's name to the simple name of its class.

  • Method Details

    • setCubeMalus

      public void setCubeMalus(int cubeMalus)
      Sets the malus value for the cube.
      Parameters:
      cubeMalus - the malus value to set for the cube

    • setReward

      public void setReward(List<CargoCube> reward)
      Sets the reward for the smuggler, represented as a list of CargoCube objects.
      Parameters:
      reward - the list of CargoCube objects to be set as the smuggler's reward

    • getFirstState

      public CardState getFirstState()
      Returns the initial state of the card.
      Specified by:
      getFirstState in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      the first CardState, which is CHOOSE_CANNONS.

    • play

      public void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices)
      Executes the appropriate action based on the current state of the game and the player's choices.
      Specified by:
      play in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - an instance of PlayerChoicesDataStructure containing the player's decisions such as chosen cannons, storage locations, and reward acceptance.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - if the current state is not recognized.
      IllegalArgumentException - if required choices within playerChoices are not provided for specific states.

    • toClientCard

      public ClientCard toClientCard()
      Converts the current instance of the Smugglers card into a corresponding ClientSmugglers object.
      Specified by:
      toClientCard in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      an instance of ClientSmugglers, containing the properties of the current Smugglers card, including card name, image name, required firepower, reward, steps back, and cube malus.
